text: Jo manusya apalya imananantara allahasi inkara karila, tyacyakherija, jyala tase karanyasa bhaga padale jave ani tyace mana matra imanavara kayama asave, parantu je loka agadi mokalya manane kupra (inkara) karatila tara asa lokanvara allahaca prakopa ahe ani asaca lokansathi bhayankara siksa yatana ahe
